review: Fire TV is more than I expected.  Talk about easy to install,  nothing to it.  Plug it in to the tv, plug it in to the wall,  turn on the TV and watch it.  My only warning would be concerned with your idea of what tv is supposed to mean.  You can watch some tv series for free and you can purchase some tv series.  I have not found a way to watch live TV It airs.  That doesn't bother me but when they say you can watch tv, some might think that means live tv.
author: K. C. Kaericher
